actions.text: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Young (AK).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 115-786 to strike sections 302(c) and 307, and modifies sections 205, 207, 304, 30 6, 406, and 408. The amendment also includes a new section regarding voting procedures for the Western Alaska Community Development Quota Program's administrative panel.
purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 115-786 to strike sections 302(c) and 307, and modifies sections 205, 207, 304, 30 6, 406, and 408.
